special_notes: Letter 'O' on personalized tags ONLY. Standard tags use number '0'. Symbols (AMPERSAND [&], PLUS [+], DASH [-]) must ALWAYS be included. Do NOT key stacked character CH. Example: NH-5926C, NH:-CACHE-, NH:&SQIRL, NH:+139+, NH:-G00D&U. For tags with symbols, dropdown is ALWAYS set to STANDARD, not 'DASH IN tag'. Do NOT accept symbols for other states.

stacked_character_rules.position: Do NOT key stacked character CH.
stacked_character_rules.notes: Symbols must be included for NH only.
